main event: Multiple sightings of green objects were reported in the vicinity of the SW Bermuda Islands on July 14, 1958. The objects were described as bright and traveling at great speed, with some appearing to disintegrate.
interesting points: Reported sightings from separate locations in the area.
Objects described as green and appearing to disintegrate at times.
Possible conclusions ranged from balloons to unknown aircraft, with meteors considered as a probable explanation.
Hand-drawn map or plot of the area included in the report.
Similar unidentified object reports from other locations around the same time, suggesting a common time grouping.
sighted object: Multiple green objects traveling at great speed
witnesses: Local residents, military personnel, and a KO-97 crew
